entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a company that has one class of securities registered under Section 12 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The company's authorized capital stock consists of 4,000,000,000 shares of common stock, $0.001 par value, and 2,000,000 shares of preferred stock, $0.001 par value. Holders of common stock are entitled to vote, receive dividends, and share in assets upon liquidation, subject to preferences for preferred stock. The company has anti-takeover provisions in its charter documents.
